tika-s0402t15:1_1: Ito paresu kodhavaggādīsu upanandhanalakkhaṇoti kujjhanavasena “akkocchi maṁ avadhi ma”ntiādinā cittapariyonandhanalakkhaṇo.
tika-s0402t15:1_4: Āghātavatthunā cittaṁ bandhantī viya hotīti aparakālo kodho upanāho.
tika-s0402t15:1_6: tassa pubbakāritālakkhaṇassa guṇassa makkhanaṁ udakapuñchaniyā viya sarīrānugatassa udakassa puñchanaṁ
tika-s0402t15:1_8: Tathā hi so paresaṁ guṇānaṁ makkhanaṭṭhena makkhoti vuccati.
tika-s0402t15:1_11: tava ca mama ca ko viseso”tiādinā nayena uppajjamāno yugaggāhī palāsoti āha “yugaggāhalakkhaṇo palāso”ti.
tika-s0402t15:1_15: paresaṁ guṇe ḍaṁsitvā dantehi viya chinditvā attano guṇehi same karotīti attho.
tika-s0402t15:2_3: Maccharāyanalakkhaṇanti attano sampattiyā parehi sādhāraṇabhāve asahanalakkhaṇaṁ.
tika-s0402t15:2_6: Aññathā attano pavedanapuggalo kerāṭiko nekatikavāṇijoti vadanti.
tika-s0402t15:2_7: Kerāṭiko hi puggalo ānandamaccho viya hoti.
tika-s0402t15:3_0: 187.Yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ nirayeti yathā ābhataṁ kañci āharitvā ṭhapito,
tika-s0402t15:3_1: evaṁ attano kammunā nikkhitto niraye ṭhapitoyevāti attho.
